flags.text: This project guide has low-quality images. Pictures need to be either re-edited or re-taken.

flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction:
Ingredients

  • Juice Powder(any powder, except for ice tea)
  • Sugar
  • Condensed or Evaporated Milk
  • Ice Cubes(Or any, kind of ice, this shouldn't be melted)
  • Water

Steps

1.

1

Put all the juice powder in the blender.

2.

2

Add three(3) tablespoons of sugar.

3.

3

Add four(4) cup of water(more, if wanted to be more thinner)

4.

4

Eight(8) Ice cubes.

5.

5

Shake, in number three, watch till the powder dissolve.

6.

6

Add three(3) spoons of condensed milk, if not, four(4) spoons of evaporated.

7.

7

Taste it, if the taste is too sweet, add more water, then if it doesn't have any taste you might wanted to add another tablespoons of sugar.

8.

8

Do the steps again, if you add extra water or sugar

Tips

  • Lesser water, might will be hard to drink, because it's thick, just add exact water(2-5 cups of water) 6-10 cups, will be a juice not a shake.
  • If you want it to be sweeter, mix two spoons of condensed milk and three evaporated, if possible.

Warnings

  • Do not put your hand inside the blender
  • If you are a child, you should ask an adult for help.
  • Hold the cap tightly, do not worry about being electrocuted, just don't touch the plug/electrical wire if you're hands are wet.
  • Unplug the blender when you are finished
  • Do not add too much sugar

Things You'll Need

  • Blender
  • Spoon
  • Straw, if wanted.

guide.summary: Sometimes, we are out of fruits to make a shake, You have a juice powder, you do not want to drink it also, because the taste appeals you already.
guide.title: shake
